mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbsr`.* FROM tb_basic_sys_region as `tbsr`
GROUP BY
`tbsr`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRegionPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbsr`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_region as `tbsr`
GROUP BY
`tbsr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRegionPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbsr`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_region as `tbsr`
GROUP BY
`tbsr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRegionPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbsr`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_region as `tbsr`
GROUP BY
`tbsr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRegionPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbsr`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_sys_region as `tbsr`
GROUP BY
`tbsr`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicSysRegionPo.havingClause}
